data.name: The Endless Journey-Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original sound tracks for "The Endless Journey" composed by TetraCalyx, contain the following pieces:
(mp3,320kbps）

01. Un Voyage Imaginaire
Lyrics/composition/arrangement/singing：TetraCalyx

02. Gala For Travelers
Lyrics/composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx
singing：Cosette STARRING Hanser, Jean Valjean STARRING 冷泉夜月

03. Titlepage Of The Story
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

04. Tickets For Three
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

05. Autumn Forest
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

06. Roaming
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

07. Sunshine Through Stained Glass
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

08. Floating Memories
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

09. A Little Rest
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

10. Trio
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

11. Dogfight
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

12. Bitte Komm Mit Uns(Rehearsal)
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

13. Bitte Komm Mit Uns(Performance)
Lyrics：TetraCalyx, 风陵渡
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx
singing：Sanger STARRING YUKIri feat. Cosette STARRING Hanser, Jean Valjean STARRING 冷泉夜月, Julian Shultz STARRING 梁, Serenade STARRING 秦且歌, Drum STARRING 大白, Eponine STARRING TetraCalyx

14. Mysterious Castle
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

15. Dimmed Lights
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

16. Behind the Curtain
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

17. Trot
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

18. End Of Mortals
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

19. Falling Snow Flakes
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

20. Quartet Battle
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx
singing：Sanger STARRING YUKIri

21. Gala For Travelers(A Doll's Memory)
composition/arrangement：TetraCalyx

22. Gala For Travelers(A Girl's Memory)


About The DLC Content!
Someone has bought the DLC pack, but they can't find the content!
We are very sorry for the unclear description!

All The DLC Content will be in the local Folder
By Property -> local Folder ->《The Endless Journey》Original Soundtrack


All the content will be in it.

Thanks for your supporting for 《The Endless Journey》!
